articles.title: Anne Hathaway Shares Her Feelings on Jared Leto's Method Acting in WeCrashed - Town & Country
articles.description: Hathaway revealed in a recent interview that she didn't speak with Leto out of his WeCrashed character until the show's premiere.
articles.content:
